title: A Troubling Admission About Covid (Ep 1670)
description:
In this episode I address the disturbing admission by the covid “experts” that indicates conservatives were right the whole time. 

News Picks:

The parents of the UPenn swimmers pen a poignant letter demanding the NCAA change the rules. 


New records are released about the JFK assassination.


This Russian collusion hoaxer is getting off with a slap on the wrist.


Federal tax revenue by year, which proves liberals are lying about the Reagan tax cuts. 


The coronavirus study discussed in the show.


The middle class benefitted from the Trump tax cuts.
